highlights: Player flow now transitions from code entry into lobby with clearer status hints.
Host app launches offline-first and only prompts authentication when cloud features are needed.
Lobby cloud readiness badge now supports one-tap sign-in.
Host startup resilience improved with safer auth bootstrap fallback behavior.
Cloud sync mode now gracefully falls back to local mode if sign-in fails.
Player and host navigation stability refinements completed.
Lobby profile editing and guest presence experience were polished.
Start confirmation and animated transition to game were added for players.
General reliability fixes and regression coverage updates were applied.
